title: STREAM: Slasher Flicks – Enter The Slasher House
body:
Animal Collective have posted a full visual album stream of Avey Tare’s new project Slasher Flicks on their Youtube channel.

Stream Enter The Slasher House below.

Enter The Slasher House is out on Domino on April 7/8th. Preorder it [here](http://smarturl.it/slasherflicksitunes).

  
Visuals by Abby Portner.

Avey Tare explains the Slasher House project as: _“A group of three hippies on a road trip through the backwaters of 2013s rural music scene fall prey to a murderous cannibalistic band making, including a leather-masked, guitar-wielding Avey Tare (Animal Collective), his knife-wielding keyboard player Angel Deradoorian (Dirty Projectors), and their cannibal chief drummer and decaying grandfather Jeremy Hyman (Ponytail, Boredoms, Dan Deacon).”_

Tracklisting:

[00:00](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [05:36](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) A Sender  
[05:37](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [09:54](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Duplex Trip  
[09:55](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [13:39](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Blind Babe  
[13:39](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [17:53](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Little Fang  
[17:54](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [21:10](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Catchy (Was Contagious)  
[21:11](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [25:40](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) That It Won’t Grow  
[25:41](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [31:44](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) The Outlaw  
[31:45](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [38:25](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Roses on the Window  
[38:26](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [41:35](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Modern Days E  
[41:36](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [44:39](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Strange Colores  
[44:40](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) – [49:44](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6H4OGARJMs#) Your Card
